items.summary:
Labor Day 2025 has officially arrived, and while there have been a serious number of notable price drops on Apple gear for over a week now, much of the best of them are still kicking today. The return of all-time low pricing across most M3 iPad Air models continues at $150 off alongside $100 price drops on iPad mini 7 and up to $200 off M4 iPad Pro. Those deals also join ongoing offers on M4 MacBook Air and M4 MacBook Pro at $200 and $300 off, respectively, as well as AirPods 4 at very close to the best price ever and a series of iPhone 15/16 Pro deals as well.

items.title: Top 10 best Labor Day deals from $20: AirPods, Sony XM6, Find My card, Lectric, Legion Tab 3, more
items.summary:
Labor Day is delivering some big time price drops on highly sought-after gear this year. From MacBooks and Android tablets to 2025 Samsung foldables and e-bikes, we are also tracking some particularly solid discounts on AirPods 4 and the amazing new Sony XM6 headphones. Those deals also join offers on Amazon’s latest Kindle readers and some of our favorite Apple gear accessories too. All of the most notable discounts are in our master hub right here, but be sure to head below for a closer look at our top 10 favorite Labor Day deals up for grabs today followed some ultra-affordable accessories and essentials starting from $4.

Luggage can get pretty expensive, but this value-packed bundle includes a total of five pieces and clocks in at only $150. items.summary:
Anker 167.5W 3-Port USB-C Car Charger

Buy for $36 (Reg. $54)

What we love

On busy days commuting from one place to the next, it’s easy to find batteries running low on your devices. Thankfully, Anker and others have really leaned into very powerful car chargers like this. Here you’ll find a unit that can distribute up to 167.5W of power to three devices. This is dished out at up to 100W for it’s main USB-C port and the secondary Type-C output tops out at 45W. Finally, the USB-A port can reach 22.5W. Another perk is that Anker includes a USB-C cable to get you started.

This unit is ready to crank out 50,000 BTUs of heat, which is powered by a propane tank that is hidden in its base.

items.title: Still live: Lenovo’s compact yet powerful Legion Tab Gen 3 Android tablet down at $399 all-time low
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Labor Day sale, Lenovo is offering its 2025 Legion Tab Gen 3 for $398.99 shipped. Don’t forget to enter promo code EXTRAFIVE during checkout to see the discounted price. The tablet debuted at $500 earlier this year, with its price jumping up to $550 shortly after launch. It is, however, available with a solid $151 discount at the moment, landing $19 below its previous low and our mention from earlier this month. This is the lowest price we’ve seen for this tablet outside of special EDU and professional offers. It stands out as one of the best Android tablets you can get in this price range, and you can learn more about it below.

Outfitted with outlets that collapse when not in use, this power strip stands just 0.7 inches tall. When you plug something into one of its four AC outlets, they will automatically pop up and allocate the necessary space. In addition to the aforementioned AC connections, you’ll also find dual Type-C and two USB-A ports.

items.title: Save up to 62% on EcoFlow’s three power station bundles and dual solar panel deal starting from $479 in Labor Day flash sale
items.summary:
As part of EcoFlow’s ongoing Labor Day Sale, the brand has launched a 24-hour flash sale lasting through the holiday with up to 62% being taken off four different bundled units – three of which are power stations and one being a dual solar panel package. Things start off lowest with the DELTA 2 Portable Power Station coming with a free waterproof bag at $479 shipped, which does match the price we’re seeing on the station at Amazon, though it doesn’t come with the free protective bag. Coming down from its $1,049 full price tag on EcoFlow’s website, whereas Amazon usually sees it start around $699, we’ve only seen this rate beaten out by a drop lower to $449, which last appeared back in May, with you otherwise getting the second-best price through the rest of the day that saves you $570 off the MSRP.

more…

items.title: Here are the LEGO sets releasing in September 2025 from Icons, Ideas, DC, Marvel, Disney, more + advent calendars and GWPs
items.summary:
It’s been an exciting summer for LEGO, as we’ve seen massive waves of new building sets release over the last few months with regular unveilings of new sets happening in between. Following the 107 new releases we saw hit the scene last month, September is geared up to be a much smaller event, though one stacked with plenty of standouts that already have builders champing at the bits – with some already available to preorder too. Of course, there are four different Gift With Purchase rewards that will be popping up for Harry Potter and the recently revealed Pirates of the Caribbean sets. You can get the full rundown below and start planning (or preordering) what will be joining your collection once the clock ticks over to September.
